message: Starting race condition hunt - will grep for LockedRegistryFile, nested locks, TOCTOU patterns, and shared state issues

Found: _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers uses claim_phase_for_review for atomicity. Now checking state_db.py implementation for actual atomic guarantees, and health_daemon.py for remaining LockedRegistryFile usages
Found 3 issues so far: TOCTOU in spawn check, nested locks in lifecycle.py, health_daemon JSON locks. Now checking update_agent_progress for race conditions in phase transitions.
Reported 6 findings. Now doing final sweep for remaining race condition patterns - checking shared state modifications without locks.

Race condition hunt complete. Found 7 concurrency issues: 1 CRITICAL (TOCTOU in agent spawn), 4 HIGH (nested locks, phase review TOCTOU, multiple spawn paths, health_daemon JSON locks), 2 MEDIUM (unlocked reads, double finalization). Provided fix recommendations using atomic SQLite transactions.
